body:
Erm... With the release of Avicore, i have decided to make a new AMA!
Ask Me Anything!
body_tagged:
Erm... With the release of Avicore, i have decided to make a new AMA!
Ask Me Anything!
title: AMA 3.0

replies.body: Why did you choose your IGN to be irex681?
replies.body_tagged: Why did you choose your IGN to be irex681?

replies.body:
@Clock, : Irex comes from T-Rex. My irl name is Ivan, so I made it "irex". The 681 is there Bulgaria was freed from the Turkish Empire. So I put them together!
In 1.8, i'm going to change my name to Irex.
replies.body_tagged:
@Clock, : Irex comes from T-Rex. My irl name is Ivan, so I made it "irex". The 681 is there Bulgaria was freed from the Turkish Empire. So I put them together!
In 1.8, i'm going to change my name to Irex.

replies.body:
@Zoro Always <3
@EvilChriz - Depends on the lunar calendar.

replies.body:
1. Favorite Avicus player.
2. 1/10 how good am I?
3. How do you feel about Avicore in general?
4. How do you feel about the staff system?
5. Will you make me a super awesome Koala skin pronto?
6. Are you proud I did something on the fourms! :D
7. Will you rape me.

replies.body:
1. Other than irl friends, Ducks,Storm,Vlushy, and some others who I talk to <3.
2. 1.337
3. I like it, mixed feelings about the hub though
4. Makes sense! I think directors should be changed to "Admins"
5. I has finals to study. D: But I would.
6. Very!
7.  Is that a statement? xD If it's a question, then: NuPlsIFan
